## General exposure equation {style="font-size:75%;"}

<br>

::::: columns
::: column
$$
\frac{N^2}{t} = \frac{L \cdot S}{K}
$$

<br>

-   N = f-number (aperture)\
-   t = shutter speed\
-   L = scene luminance (cd/mÂ²)\
-   S = ISO sensitivity\
-   K = calibration constant
